alert.note: Alert for Eastern Cochise County Below 5000 Feet including Douglas, Willcox; Upper San Pedro River Valley including Sierra Vista, Benson (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued March 22 at 1:55AM MST until March 22 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Southwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 45 mph. * WHERE...Lower elevations of Cochise County. * WHEN...In effect through 5 PM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. Strong crosswinds could affect high profile vehicles. Winds could produce areas of blowing dust, especially along Interstate 10 near the Willcox Playa and between Willcox and the New Mexico state line.
info.instruction: A Wind Advisory means that sustained winds of 30 mph or greater are expected in the valleys. Higher gusts are also likely. Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Cochise County Below 5000 Feet including Douglas, Willcox; Upper San Pedro River Valley including Sierra Vista, Benson
